description: '''Rustie''' (born '''Russell Whyte''', 4 January 1983) is a Scottish musician from [[Glasgow]]. He is associated with the [[Numbers (record label)|Numbers]] label collective and first received attention for his 2007 EP ''Jagz the Smack''. He signed to [[Warp Records]] in 2009. His 2011 debut album ''[[Glass Swords]]'' won him widespread acclaim. His music blends disparate genres, including [[hip hop]], [[rave music|rave]], and [[EDM trap music|electronic trap]].
